definition: use of words
to dispatch/to send/to dispel
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Construct your own sentences using the words that you have noted in your dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 用你在個人詞庫中所寫下的單詞進行遣詞造句。

sentences.english: They are not inventive and cannot "play" with language the way humans do.
sentences.chinese: 它們不像人工翻譯那樣具有創新性，能遣詞造句。

sentences.english: I had corrected some vocabularies cause that made many people misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 會有人會錯意，所以我重新修改用字遣詞。

sentences.english: This article mainly discusses the style and diction with the special reference to the study and application of synonymity.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要討論語體與遣詞在同義性方面的運用。
的確，洪堡的遣詞用字是無可指責的。
